column17:
Product Description

T Gel Daily Control 2-in-1 Dandruff Shampoo PlusConditioner is a unique frequent-use formula that fights dandruff while providing extra detangling benefits for soft healthy-looking hair.This dermatologist-recommended formula is developed with Pyrithione Zinc to relieve itching and flaking Vitamin E to moisturize both hair and scalp and wheat proteins that are known to nourish and help protect hair from further damage. Gentle enough to use daily this formula cleanses the scalp and leaves hair soft and manageable in one simple step.Get effective fast-acting dandruff relief that leaves hair soft manageable and healthy-looking.
